name: Alchemical Reaction [demo]
description:
Alchemical Reaction is an LGBT-friendly dating sim about an up-and-coming alchemist trying to make a life for themselves in a new town. You have the option of playing as a male or female protagonist, and the demo allows you to meet several of the potential love interests.

The finished game is planned to have you balance your career as an alchemist with your love life and friendships; for now, get acquainted with some people in the Kingdom and set up shop! We hope you'll enjoy what we have so far.

[ please consider supporting the team leader if you're interested! times have been tough and have interfered with development. https://ko-fi.com/chizuny ]
